_source.text: 24-70 f/2.8 II CONs: -Lacks image stabilization, may require more skill/effort to get good shots, not as good for video -Heavier/bigger -Expensive, if not overpriced -Larger 82mm filter thread, though this is one reason the image quality is better

text: 24-70 f/2.8 II CONs: -Lacks **image** **stabilization**, may require more skill/effort to get good shots, not as good for video -Heavier/bigger -Expensive, if not overpriced -Larger 82mm filter thread, though this is one **reason** the **image** quality **is** **better**
